Name: Yamata No Orochi
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Thunderous Breath, Devastating Claws and The Eight Heads of Orochi.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: When this model targets a LEGENDARY Formation in the Melee Combat step, improve the Rend and Damage Characteristics of that attack by 1.
Any attack that targets this model with a Rend Characteristic of -2 or better are treated as having a Rend Characteristic of -1.

Spells.Name: Wrath of the Skies (30)
Spells.Effect: Place a 10” blast template wholly within 24” of the caster and roll a D6 for every enemy model under the template. On a roll of 4+, that models’ Formation suffers 1 Ethereal Damage.
